legendaryGroup.name: Zacheus
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Zacheus can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Boosters. The bloodwing increases it's speed by 30 ft.
Absorb blood. The bloodwing absorbs any nearby blood and recharges it's blood cannon.

Updraft. The Bloodwing's decks suddenly radiate heat causing massive turbulence and random gusts of wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, a 60 ft. tall column of air above the deck is considered difficult terrain to all but Zacheus. When a medium or smaller creature flies into that area of starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
